verses.verse: Now the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> and the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> had<WH1961> a very<WH3966> great<WH6099> multitude<WH7227> of cattle:<WH4735> and when they saw<WH7200> <WH853> the land<WH776> of Jazer,<WH3270> and the land<WH776> of Gilead,<WH1568> that, behold,<WH2009> the place<WH4725> was a place<WH4725> for cattle;<WH4735>

The children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> came<WH935> and spoke<WH559> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> and to<WH413> Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> and unto<WH413> the princes<WH5387> of the congregation,<WH5712> saying,<WH559>
Ataroth, <WH5852> and Dibon,<WH1769> and Jazer,<WH3270> and Nimrah,<WH5247> and Heshbon,<WH2809> and Elealeh,<WH500> and Shebam,<WH7643> and Nebo,<WH5015> and Beon,<WH1194>

Even the country<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> smote<WH5221> before<WH6440> the congregation<WH5712> of Israel,<WH3478> is a land<WH776> for cattle,<WH4735> and thy servants<WH5650> have cattle: <WH4735>

Wherefore, said<WH559> they, if<WH518> we have found<WH4672> grace<WH2580> in thy sight,<WH5869> let<WH853> this<WH2063> land<WH776> be given<WH5414> unto thy servants<WH5650> for a possession,<WH272> and bring us not over<WH5674> <WH408> <WH853> Jordan.<WH3383>

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and to the children<WH1121> of Reuben,<WH7205> Shall your brethren<WH251> go<WH935> to war,<WH4421> and shall ye<WH859> sit<WH3427> here?<WH6311>

And wherefore<WH4100> discourage<WH5106> ye<WH853> the heart<WH3820> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> from going over<WH4480> <WH5674> into<WH413> the land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> hath given<WH5414> them?
Thus <WH3541> did<WH6213> your fathers,<WH1> when I sent<WH7971> them from Kadesh-barnea<WH4480> <WH6947> to see<WH7200> <WH853> the land.<WH776>

For when they went up<WH5927> unto<WH5704> the valley<WH5158> of Eshcol,<WH812> and saw<WH7200> <WH853> the land,<WH776> they discouraged<WH5106> <WH853> the heart<WH3820> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> that they should not<WH1115> go<WH935> into<WH413> the land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> had given<WH5414> them.
And the LORD's<WH3068> anger<WH639> was kindled<WH2734> the same<WH1931> time,<WH3117> and he swore,<WH7650> saying,<WH559>

Surely <WH518> none of the men<WH376> that came up<WH5927> out of Egypt,<WH4480> <WH4714> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH4480> <WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> shall see<WH7200> <WH853> the land<WH127> which<WH834> I swore<WH7650> unto Abraham,<WH85> unto Isaac,<WH3327> and unto Jacob;<WH3290> because<WH3588> they have not<WH3808> wholly<WH4390> followed<WH310> me:

Save <WH1115> Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> the Kenezite,<WH7074> and Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun:<WH5126> for<WH3588> they have wholly<WH4390> followed<WH310> the LORD.<WH3068>

And the LORD's<WH3068> anger<WH639> was kindled<WH2734> against Israel,<WH3478> and he made them wander<WH5128> in the wilderness<WH4057> forty<WH705> years,<WH8141> until<WH5704> all<WH3605> the generation,<WH1755> that had done<WH6213> evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of the LORD,<WH3068> was consumed.<WH8552>

And, behold,<WH2009> ye are risen up<WH6965> in your fathers' stead,<WH8478> <WH1> an increase<WH8635> of sinful<WH2400> men,<WH376> to augment<WH5595> <WH5921> yet<WH5750> the fierce<WH2740> anger<WH639> of the LORD<WH3068> toward<WH413> Israel.<WH3478>

For <WH3588> if ye turn away<WH7725> from after<WH4480> <WH310> him, he will yet<WH5750> again<WH3254> leave<WH5117> them in the wilderness;<WH4057> and ye shall destroy<WH7843> all<WH3605> this<WH2088> people.<WH5971>
And they came near<WH5066> unto<WH413> him, and said,<WH559> We will build<WH1129> sheepfolds<WH1448> <WH6629> here<WH6311> for our cattle,<WH4735> and cities<WH5892> for our little ones: <WH2945>

But we<WH587> ourselves will go ready armed<WH2502> <WH2363> before<WH6440> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> until<WH5704> <WH834> <WH518> we have brought<WH935> them unto<WH413> their place:<WH4725> and our little ones<WH2945> shall dwell<WH3427> in the fenced<WH4013> cities<WH5892> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land.<WH776>
We will not<WH3808> return<WH7725> unto<WH413> our houses,<WH1004> until<WH5704> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> have inherited<WH5157> every man<WH376> his inheritance.<WH5159>

For <WH3588> we will not<WH3808> inherit<WH5157> with<WH854> them on yonder side<WH4480> <WH5676> Jordan,<WH3383> or forward;<WH1973> because<WH3588> our inheritance<WH5159> is fallen<WH935> to<WH413> us on this side<WH4480> <WH5676> Jordan<WH3383> eastward.<WH4217>
And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto<WH413> them, If<WH518> ye will do<WH6213> <WH853> this<WH2088> thing,<WH1697> if<WH518> ye will go armed<WH2502> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> to war,<WH4421>

And will go<WH5674> all<WH3605> of you armed<WH2502> over<WH853> Jordan<WH3383> before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> until<WH5704> he hath driven out<WH3423> <WH853> his enemies<WH341> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> him,

And the land<WH776> be subdued<WH3533> before<WH6440> the LORD:<WH3068> then afterward<WH310> ye shall return,<WH7725> and be<WH1961> guiltless<WH5355> before the LORD,<WH4480> <WH3068> and before Israel;<WH4480> <WH3478> and this<WH2063> land<WH776> shall be<WH1961> your possession<WH272> before<WH6440> the LORD.<WH3068>
But if<WH518> ye will not<WH3808> do<WH6213> so,<WH3651> behold,<WH2009> ye have sinned<WH2398> against the LORD:<WH3068> and be sure<WH3045> your sin<WH2403> will find you out.<WH4672> <WH853>
Build <WH1129> you cities<WH5892> for your little ones,<WH2945> and folds<WH1448> for your sheep;<WH6792> and do<WH6213> that which hath proceeded out<WH3318> of your mouth.<WH4480> <WH6310>

And the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> spoke<WH559> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559> Thy servants<WH5650> will do<WH6213> as<WH834> my lord<WH113> commandeth.<WH6680>
Our little ones,<WH2945> our wives,<WH802> our flocks,<WH4735> and all<WH3605> our cattle,<WH929> shall be<WH1961> there<WH8033> in the cities<WH5892> of Gilead: <WH1568>
But thy servants<WH5650> will pass over,<WH5674> every man<WH3605> armed<WH2502> for war,<WH6635> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> to battle,<WH4421> as<WH834> my lord<WH113> saith.<WH1696>

So concerning them Moses<WH4872> commanded<WH6680> <WH853> Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> and Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> and the chief<WH7218> fathers<WH1> of the tribes<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478>

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto<WH413> them, If<WH518> the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> will pass with you over<WH5674> <WH854> <WH853> Jordan,<WH3383> every man<WH3605> armed<WH2502> to battle,<WH4421> before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> and the land<WH776> shall be subdued<WH3533> before<WH6440> you; then ye shall give<WH5414> them<WH853> the land<WH776> of Gilead<WH1568> for a possession: <WH272>
But if<WH518> they will not<WH3808> pass over<WH5674> with<WH854> you armed,<WH2502> they shall have possessions<WH270> among<WH8432> you in the land<WH776> of Canaan.<WH3667>

And the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> answered,<WH6030> saying,<WH559> <WH853> As<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> hath said<WH1696> unto<WH413> thy servants,<WH5650> so<WH3651> will we do.<WH6213>

We <WH5168> will pass over<WH5674> armed<WH2502> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> into the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> that the possession<WH272> of our inheritance<WH5159> on this side<WH4480> <WH5676> Jordan<WH3383> may be ours.

And Moses<WH4872> gave<WH5414> unto them, even to the children<WH1121> of Gad,<WH1410> and to the children<WH1121> of Reuben,<WH7205> and unto half<WH2677> the tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh<WH4519> the son<WH1121> of Joseph,<WH3130> <WH853> the kingdom<WH4467> of Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites,<WH567> and the kingdom<WH4467> of Og<WH5747> king<WH4428> of Bashan,<WH1316> the land,<WH776> with the cities<WH5892> thereof in the coasts,<WH1367> even the cities<WH5892> of the country<WH776> round about.<WH5439>
And the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> built<WH1129> <WH853> Dibon,<WH1769> and Ataroth,<WH5852> and Aroer,<WH6177>
And Atroth,<WH5852> Shophan,<WH5855> and Jaazer,<WH3270> and Jogbehah,<WH3011>
And Beth-nimrah,<WH1039> and Beth-haran,<WH1028> fenced<WH4013> cities:<WH5892> and folds<WH1448> for sheep.<WH6629>
And the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> built<WH1129> <WH853> Heshbon,<WH2809> and Elealeh,<WH500> and Kirjathaim,<WH7156>

And Nebo,<WH5015> and Baal-meon,<WH1186> (their names<WH8034> being changed),<WH5437> and<WH853> Shibmah:<WH7643> and gave other names<WH7121> <WH8034> <WH853> <WH8034> unto the cities<WH5892> which<WH834> they built.<WH1129>

And the children<WH1121> of Machir<WH4353> the son<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519> went<WH1980> to Gilead,<WH1568> and took<WH3920> it, and dispossessed<WH3423> <WH853> the Amorite<WH567> which<WH834> was in it.
And Moses<WH4872> gave<WH5414> <WH853> Gilead<WH1568> unto Machir<WH4353> the son<WH1121> of Manasseh;<WH4519> and he dwelt<WH3427> therein.
And Jair<WH2971> the son<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519> went<WH1980> and took<WH3920> <WH853> the small towns<WH2333> thereof, and called<WH7121> them Havoth-jair.<WH2334>
And Nobah<WH5025> went<WH1980> and took<WH3920> <WH853> Kenath,<WH7079> and the villages<WH1323> thereof, and called<WH7121> it Nobah,<WH5025> after his own name.<WH8034>
